basics.name: John Mikael Gundersen
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Developer with a passion for automated testing, clean code and pipelines

work.name: Protector
work.summary: Primarily I'm concerned with code quality and best practices.
highlights: Implemented project initializer to make it easier to create new solutions
Created a framework to efficiently deal with system testing

work.name: TietoEvry
work.summary: Made banking systems for some of the biggest banks in the Nordic region.
highlights: Made and maintained core web systems for multiple banks
Creating new systems for integration testing and improved CI/CD pipelines
Authoring developer guidelines for cleaner more maintainable code
I was a team lead managing the team responsible for our PCI compliant systems
I was a project architect where I guided new banks into the solution, and was responsible for the technical aspects of that solution
Worked closely with partners in India

work.name: Aspit
work.summary: Made electronic health record systems for the privatized healthcare sector in Norway. Started as a system developer for the first 3 years, eventually got promoted to the position of a team lead.
highlights: Was responsible for the development of the core product
Worked closely with the business by planning and implementing new features
Worked closely with an outsourcing team in Vietnam

projects.name: toUUID
projects.description: A very simple project that makes it easier to generate predictable UUIDs for testing purposes.
